BP.d: Add specific amount of durability/water/energy to items in hotbar and equipped armor. (Will charge batteries)

BP.c: AddExperience <XP Quantity> <XP Came From Tribe?> <Share With Tribe?>
BP.d: Add experience to a player, and optionally make it apply as if it came from a tribemate and/or share the XP with the tribe. (0 = false, 1 = true)
Whitelists a specific player using their Steam ID.
Details on this command are unknown.
Bans a player from the server based on their player ID.
Broadcasts a message to all players.
Starts or stops a weather event. (start_superheat, stop_superheat, start_sandstorm, stop_sandstorm, start_electricalstorm, stop_electricalstorm, start_rain, stop_rain)
Changes the size of a player.
Clears the Cryo Sickness status effect from targeted dino.(Wakes dino up)
Clear a player's inventory and/or item slots. (0 = false, 1 = true)
Clears the game tutorial making it so they re-appear without being forced.
Debug information on structures.
Destroy all creatures of a certain type.
Destroys ALL creatures on the map. (WARNING: This command is incorrectly labeled; it will also killed TAMED dinos.)
Kills or destroys the target creature or structure.
Destroys all structures on the map.
Destroys all creatures in the tribe of the target (player/creature).
Kills all players in the tribe of the target (player/creature).
Destroys all structures in the tribe of the target (player/creature).
Destroy all untamed creatures.
Disables spectator mode for current player.
Removes a specific player from the server's whitelist using their Steam ID.
Shuts down the server.
Details on this command are unknown.
Tames the target creature, but only if they can be tamed normally. (Use 'ForceTame' to force tame any creature.)
Makes the current player invisible to all creatures (preventing them from aggroing.)
Enables cheats for a server that requires a password.
Enables spectator mode for current player.
Puts the current player to sleep or wakes them up.
Allows current player to fly. (Use 'Walk' to disable.)
Changes a player's tribe based on the player or structure that is being targeted.
Forces a player (using their player ID) to join a specific tribe.
Tames the target dino.
Details on this command are unknown.
Tames all dinos within specified radius, defaults to 2000 if no number is given.
Executes a custom command.
Returns the state of all dinos that are currently spawned on the map.
Returns the most recent chat messages.
Returns the most recent server logs.
Returns the player ID for a player based on their Steam ID. This does not currently work.
Returns the Steam ID for a player based on their player ID.
Returns the list of players in a Tribe.
Adds an item to the current player's inventory. 'Blueprint Path Part' is a partial match. For example, you can use 'spy' to spawn the Spyglass.
Similar to 'fly', this command allows the current player to move through all objects. (Use 'walk' to disable.)
Gives the current player ownership of the target structure and all structures connected to it.
Gives current player a specificied quantity of every type of dye.

Enables Creative Mode for yourself, which includes: invincibility, preventing you from being encumbered, instant crafting, unlock all engrams, infinite stats, God mode, and adds the Admin Blink Rifle to your inventory. Same as command: GiveCreativeMode
Enables Creative Mode for your target. Same as: GiveCreativeModeToTarget.
Enables Creative Mode for the specified player. Same as: GiveCreativeModeToPlayer
Unlocks all engrams for the current player.

BP.c: GiveExpToPlayer <PlayerID> <Quantity of XP> <From Tribe Share?> <Prevent Sharing With Tribe?>
BP.d: Gives XP to a specific player.

BP.c: GiveExpToTarget <Quantity of XP> <From Tribe Share?> <Prevent Sharing With Tribe?>
BP.d: Gives XP to the target player.
Gives Infinite Stats to targeted player or dino. Only works on dinos currently.
Gives current player item(s) using a blueprint path (see 'Items' tab for interactive version).
Gives current player item(s) using an item number (see 'Items' tab for interactive version).
Gives a player item(s) using an item number.
Gives a player item(s) using a blueprint path.
Gives 50 of each item to the current player.
Gives an item to the target player in a specified slot number using a blueprint path.
Gives an item to the current player in a specified slot number using an item number.
Changes the ownership of the target structure or creature to the current player.
Enables the God, InfiniteStats, and EnemyInvisible commands for the current player, and also gives a large quantity of XP.
Summons a specific tamed dino at a specified level. (Quotes around the entity name are required.)
Enables god mode, making the current player invincible and not able to receive damage. (Note: Player can still be affected by drowning.)
Hides the game tutorial.
Inflicts damage to the current player.
Prevents your Health, Stamina, Oxygen, Food, and Water from decreasing.
Kicks a player from the server.
Kills the target dino or destroys the target structure.
Kills a player based on their Player ID.
Kills or destroys all items of specified category within radius. Valid categories are pawns, dinos, wild, tamed, players, or structures.
Enables the commands God, InfiniteStats, and EnemyInvisible for the current player.
List all active players.
Makes current player an admin of their tribe.
Makes current player the founder of their tribe.
Toggles the in-game menu.
Loads a map.
Disables all movement for both creatures and projectiles.
Prints a list of colors.
Spawns a mix of sheep and dodos above the player. Defaults values 30 300 200
Details on this command are unknown.
Renames a player.
Renames a tribe.
Details on this command are unknown.
Details on this command are unknown.
Enables spectator mode for a server has been configured to require a password.
Saves a server's state.
Runs a mod script.
Spawn a creature of specified type with a random level.
Sends a chat message to all players.
Sends a private chat message to a specific player using their Steam ID.
Sends a private chat message to a specific player using their user name.
Enables or disables the admin icon in chat.
Changes maturation progress of baby (between 0 and 1).
Enables cheats for the current player.
Changes facial hair growth of current player.
Sets facial hair style of current player (0: Default, 1: Mohawk, 2: Afro, 3: Romantic, 4: Dreadlocks, 5: Ponytail, 6: Braids, 7: Viking).
Pauses everything.
Enables or disables God mode for current player.
Sets the graphics quality of your client (0 = low, 3 = high).
Changes head hair growth of current player.
Sets head hair style of current player (0: Default, 1: Mohawk, 2: Afro, 3: Romantic, 4: Dreadlocks, 5: Ponytail, 6: Braids, 7: Viking).
Changes the target baby's imprint quality (from 0 to 1)
Sets a message of the day to appear when new players join the server.
Telepors the player to a specified position on the map.
Enables all player names in spectator mode.
Changes the target creature's color using a region number and color ID (1-56).

Changes the size of a specific region of the target player's body (0: Head Size, 1: Neck Size, 2: Neck Length, 3: Chest, 4: Shoulders (Width), 5: Arm Length, 6: Upper Arm (Width), 7: Lower Arm (Width), 8: Hand Size, 9: Leg Length, 10: Upper Leg (Width), 11: Lower Leg (Width), 12: Foot Size, 13: Hip Width, 14: Torso Width, 15: Upper Face Size, 16: Lower Face Size, 17: Torso Depth, 18: Head Height, 19: Head Width, 20: Head Depth, 21: Torso Height)
Sets the target player's color. (0 = body, 1 = hair, 2 = eyes)
Changes the time of day.
Shows debugging information.
Toggles in-game menu.
Shows message of the day.
Toggles the admin manager.
Shows a specific game tutorial.
Puts game in slow motion mode.
Spawns a creature or entity.
Spawns a custom number of creatures or entities.
Spawns a specific dino (see 'Dinos' tab for interactive version).
Shows debugging information. (Commands: 'fps', 'levels', 'unit', 'unitgraph')
Disables Spectator Mode for the current player.
Kills current player.
Spawns a specific creature.
Spawns a specific creature tamed.
Takes all dinos owned by the target player's tribe and transfers ownership to the current player.
Takes all structures owned by the target player's tribe and transfers ownership to the current player.
Teleports the player to the target location (or teleports them to 0,0 if no valid target is in view.)
Teleports a player (based on their player ID) to the current player.
Teleports a player (based on their name) to the current player.
Teleports the current player to another player based on their player ID.
Teleports the current player to a specific GPS coordinate.
Details on this command are unknown.
Hides weapons or hands of current player in first-person mode.
Enables or disables infinite ammo.
Unbans a player from a server.
Unlocks a specific engram for the current player.
Disables Fly mode.
Opens the admin manager GUI.
Enables spectator mode (destroys inventory).
Repairs all strucutres in given radius around player. (Only seems to work on structures that have been damaged since last server/session restart.)
Overrides the weight limit
Overrides the weight limit
Toggle volumetric clouds (0:disable, 1:enable).
Toggle volumetric fog (0:disable, 1:enable).
Toggle grass (0:disable, 1:enable).
Change gamma (2.2: Default, Range: 0-5)
Gives yourself a full set of armor of the given Tier at the given quality level. (Tier: Cloth, Chitin, Metal, Tek Hide, Fur, Desert, Ghillie, Riot, Scuba, Hazard) (Quality: 0-20)
Gives yourself all weapons in the specified tier along with the correct ammo for them. (Tier: 0 or "Primitive", 1 or "Basic", 2 or "Advanced", 3 or "Tek") (Quality: 0-20)
Adjusts a Day Cycle Manager setting. On Genesis: Part 2, using 'skybox' lets you change asteroid configurations, like 0 for Ambergris or 1 for Crystal.
Shows the locations of Mutagen Bulbs nearby. Only works on Genesis: Part 2.
Adds a status effect to you or your current dino. Use ListMyBuffs to get the correct Buff ID.
Forces a Mutagen Bulb to appear nearby.
Creates a fertilized egg from the selected dino at your location.
Sets the incubation progress of the selected egg to 0%. You still need the correct temperature for it to hatch.
Displays a list of all active Orbital Supply Drops and Element Nodes. Only works on Extinction.
Lists all players currently connected to the server along with their ARK IDs.
Connects you to a specific server using its IP and port. Add '?Password' to include a server password.
Switches graphics settings to a preview mode. The exact effect may vary.
Adjusts shadow quality. Use values from 0 (off) to 5 (epic).
Removes all active world buffs on Genesis: Part 2.
Changes the max level of wild dinos that can spawn. Use DestroyWildDinos to reset spawns.
Starts an Orbital Supply Drop or Element Node event at the nearest spawn point. Only works on Extinction.
Turns floating damage numbers on or off for the server.
Adds a custom message to a tribe's log. Use the tribe's ID to target it.
Lists the types and counts of structures owned by a specific tribe.
Lists the types and counts of dinos owned by a specific tribe.
Changes the in-game day to the specified value.
Changes the name of a player using their ARK ID.
Renames a tribe using its Tribe ID.
Adds levels to a specific stat on your character or current dino.
Adds levels to a stat for all players and dinos in a specified radius.
Increases a specific stat on the targeted player or dino by the specified number of levels.
Forces the server to reload dynamic config settings.
Teleports you to the player with the specified name.
Teleports you to a specific actor in the game world. Requires the actor's blueprint path and number.
Quickly teleports you to predefined locations, like the red obelisk.
Teleports you to specific coordinates and adjusts your view's yaw and pitch.
Moves the targeted player or dino to specific coordinates.
Teleports you to the specified active horde event. Use ListActiveHordeEvents to find event indices.
Removes all wild dinos of a specific class. Use 1 for an exact match.
Clears all foliage and resource nodes within a specified radius. Optionally adds resources to your inventory.
Destroys all assets of a specific tribe using their Tribe ID.
Removes all tamed dinos owned by the specified tribe.
Eliminates all players belonging to a specific tribe.
Destroys all structures owned by a specific tribe.
Removes structures with fewer than the specified number of connections for a specific tribe.
Eliminates all actors of the specified type. Use 1 for exact matches.
Forces a player to join a specific tribe using their player and tribe IDs.
Allows you to join the targeted tribe. Works as a shortcut for ForcePlayerToJoinTargetTribe.
Transfers all dinos and structures from the specified tribe to your control. If no ID is provided, it defaults to the targeted tribe.
Adds experience to the equipped Chibi-Pet and your character.
Adds experience to a specified player's Chibi-Pet and character.
Allows you to teleport directly to the final boss arena on Genesis: Part 1 without completing missions.
Instantly completes the active mission, usually placing you at the top of the scoreboard.
Hides or reveals the rider of a dino. Use 1 to hide and 0 to reveal.
Unlocks all Tek Engrams for your character until you disconnect.
Unlocks specific Tek Engrams for a player using a partial blueprint name.
Enables a combination of cheats, including Tek Armor, FPS stats, and GMBuff.

Performs a specific ascension command for your character. Available values are: Ascend1 (Gamma difficulty), Ascend2 (Beta difficulty), Ascend3 (Alpha difficulty), AbAscend1 (Aberration Gamma), AbAscend2 (Aberration Beta), AbAscend3 (Aberration Alpha), EXTAscend1 (Extinction Gamma), EXTAscend2 (Extinction Beta), EXTAscend3 (Extinction Alpha), Genascend1 (Genesis: Part 1 Gamma), Genascend2 (Genesis: Part 1 Beta), Genascend3 (Genesis: Part 1 Alpha), Gen2Ascend1 (Genesis: Part 2 Gamma), Gen2Ascend2 (Genesis: Part 2 Beta), Gen2Ascend3 (Genesis: Part 2 Alpha).
Maximizes your health, stamina, food, water, and other stats.
Gives you a pre-defined set of items based on the specified tier.
Removes all buffs from your character. Not all buffs are affected.
Knocks out the targeted player or dino. Use 1 to knock out and 0 to wake up.
Unlocks Alpha Ascension for Overseer and Rockwell for the specified player.
Grants the specified player the rewards for defeating a boss at the chosen difficulty.
Unlocks rewards for all alpha-level bosses for the specified player.
Unlocks all Explorer Notes and Fjordur Runes for your character. May cause temporary freezing.
Unlocks a specific Explorer Note based on the index number provided.
Adds a specified amount of hexagons to your inventory.
Prints detailed stats of the targeted dino in the console. Be cautious, as this command destroys all other dinos.
Outputs the stats of the targeted or ridden dino to the console.
Spawns a mix of dinos like trikes and parasaurs above you. Customize the number, spread, and height.
Spawns aggressive dinos like rexes and allos above you. Specify the number, spread, and height.
Drops a group of Dinopithecus above you.
Transfers imprint ownership of a dino to the specified player.
Changes the current value of a specific stat on the targeted dino. Possible values: Health, Stamina, Torpidity, Oxygen, Food, Weight, Speed, Torpidity.
Transfers all dino imprints from one player to another, optionally updating the imprint name.
Sets the taming effectiveness of a dino currently being tamed. Use values from 0 to 1.0 (100%).
Adds mutation points to a specific stat of the targeted dino. Maximum 255 mutations per stat.
Copies your current coordinates and camera rotation to your clipboard in X Y Z Yaw Pitch format. (Shortcut: ccc)
Spawns multiple tamed creatures at a specified distance and spread using a blueprint path.
Spawns a predefined set of dinos based on the specified tier. Use 0 for the full set.
Spawns a fully customized dino with specific stats, saddle, and name. Requires accurate blueprint paths.
Spawns a tamed dino with specific stats and optional saddle at the given location.
Forces the targeted or ridden dino to poop immediately.
Places the targeted dino into a cryopod.
